name: preset

schema.title: Generator ran by create-nx-plugin
schema.description: Initializes a workspace with an nx-plugin inside of it. Use as: `create-nx-plugin` or `create-nx-workspace --preset @nx/nx-plugin`.

createPackageName.description: Name of package which creates a workspace

description: Initializes a workspace with an nx-plugin inside of it. Use as: `create-nx-workspace --preset @nrwl/nx-plugin`.
